text: (b) Let x2(t) be the solution of the following (different) initial value problem: @y + 234 + 2z = f(t) z2(0) = 0, z4(0) = 0. Find the solution z5(t) when the forcing f(t) = e~* is applied, knowing that the solution xo(t) verifies: z2(t) = (z1 % f)(), where z1(t) is the solution of the previous question.
